segments.text: It's good to have you here.
Now, I don't think we know why Vladimir Putin
really decided to invade Ukraine.

a lot of those people had a favorite supposed explanation

too many countries that were too close to Russia

about NATO being too close.
And so therefore he had to invade Ukraine.
Again, I don't actually think that's it.

who knows what's going on in his little short dictator
heart of hearts.

if in fact Putin was hoping that one of the effects

Sorry, when Putin invaded Ukraine,

that gave Russia 800 more miles of border

And now as of tonight, we know that Sweden

but this is something that really until today,
it looked like it couldn't happen.

it has to be a unanimous decision.
All the other countries in the NATO Alliance

And in the case of Sweden,
